CustomField.description: Displays a 1 if the contact has any associated employment, education, or training records which qualify towards a 4 month positive outcome. Displays a 0 otherwise.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays a 1 if the contact has any associated employment, education, or training records which qualify towards a 4 month positive outcome. Displays a 0 otherwise.
CustomField.label: 4 Month Positive Outcome?
